      • alphaDiscardThreshold

        public float alphaDiscardThreshold()
        Description copied from interface: R2DepthShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        The threshold value that defines whether or not the surface fragment will be discarded. If the opacity of the surface is less than this threshold value, the surface will be discarded. A threshold value of 0.0 will result in no fragments ever being discarded.
        Specified by:
        alphaDiscardThreshold in interface R2DepthShaderBasicParametersType
        Specified by:
        alphaDiscardThreshold in interface R2DepthShaderBasicParametersValuesType
        Returns:
        The value of the alphaDiscardThreshold attribute
